entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
